author: Joey Guerra, Houston Chronicle
title: Macklemore & Ryan Lewis head downtown
text:

Image 21 of 21 Macklemore & Ryan Lewis head downtown 1 / 21 Back to Gallery 
Macklemore & Ryan Lewis, who scored some of the biggest hits of the last few years, are headed dowtown. 
The hip-pop duo returns Jan. 16 to Revention Music Center in downtown Houston. Tickets are $49.50 and $54 and go on sale at 10 a.m. Friday via livenation.com 
The duo's new single, "Downtown" previews an album due later this year. It premiered at the MTV Video Music Awards. They scored big with singles "Same Love," Thrift Shop" and "Can't Hold Us" from 2012 album "The Heist." 
Macklemore & Ryan Lewis performed in 2013 at the Free Press Summer Festival and at NRG Arena. 
Peruse the above gallery for a look at upcoming concerts. Entertainment News
